Light of the Living.name: Light of the Living
Light of the Living.flavor: Your strike flares with holy radiance, which sears nearby undead.
Light of the Living.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier radiant damage. Each undead creature within 5 squares of you takes radiant damage equal to your Strength modifier and is subject to your divine sanction until the end of your next turn.

Life and Death Entwined.name: Life and Death Entwined
Life and Death Entwined.flavor: The undead horror strikes at you, but your divine patron foils its loathsome touch and turns its aggression against it.
Life and Death Entwined.effect: You take no damage from the target’s attack. Your next attack against the target deals extra radiant damage equal to one-half the damage you would have taken from the target’s attack.

Bury the Dead.name: Bury the Dead
Bury the Dead.flavor: The light of life gleams around you as you command the restless dead to return to their graves.
Bury the Dead.onHit: 4d8 + Strength modifier radiant damage. If the target is undead, it is also restrained (save ends).
